original_text: And this your heave offering shall be reckoned unto you, as though it were the corn of the threshingfloor, and as the fulness of the winepress.
korean_text: 내가 너희의 거제물을 타작 마당에서 드리는 곡물과 포도즙 틀에서 드리는 즙 같이 여기리니

sentences.original_text: as though it were the corn of the threshingfloor
and as the fulness of the winepress
